infoDetail: is a proactive alert application, supporting people detect and avoid exposure to risk factors for dengue infection. At the same time, the application also provides necessary information about dengue fever such as information on the causative agent, measures to kill mosquitoes, preventive measures and the nearest medical facilities to the people
homeTitle: Let's all work together to prevent dengue fever !
detailFeedback: Please enter your feedback below to help make our app even better !
